AntidepressantMedicationManagement.SDE Sex:
define "SDE Sex":
	["Patient Characteristic Sex": "ONC Administrative Sex" ]
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Medication Dispensed 270 days before or:
define "Medication Dispensed 270 days before or 90 days after Start of Measurement Period":
	First( ["Medication, Dispensed": "Antidepressant Medication" ] DepMedDisp
			where DepMedDisp.authorDatetime 270 days or less before start of "Measurement Period"
				or DepMedDisp.authorDatetime 90 days or less after start of "Measurement Period"
				or DepMedDisp.authorDatetime same as start of "Measurement Period"
			sort by authorDatetime
	)
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Medication Taken within 231 Days After I:
define "Medication Taken within 231 Days After Initial Dispense":
	["Medication, Active": "Antidepressant Medication" ] ActiveMedication
		with "Medication Dispensed 270 days before or 90 days after Start of Measurement Period" InitialDispense
			such that ActiveMedication.relevantPeriod starts 231 days or less after InitialDispense.authorDatetime
				or ActiveMedication.relevantPeriod starts same as InitialDispense.authorDatetime
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.CumulativeMedicationDuration:
define function "CumulativeMedicationDuration"(Medication List< "Medication, Active" >):
	Sum( ( collapse ( Medication.relevantPeriod ) ) CMD
			return duration in days of CMD
	)
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Cumulative Medication Duration Greater T:
define "Cumulative Medication Duration Greater Than or Equal to 180 Days":
	"CumulativeMedicationDuration"( "Medication Taken within 231 Days After Initial Dispense" ) >= 180
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Medication Taken within 114 Days After I:
define "Medication Taken within 114 Days After Initial Dispense":
	["Medication, Active": "Antidepressant Medication" ] ActiveMedication
		with "Medication Dispensed 270 days before or 90 days after Start of Measurement Period" InitialDispense
			such that ActiveMedication.relevantPeriod starts 114 days or less after InitialDispense.authorDatetime
				or ActiveMedication.relevantPeriod starts same as InitialDispense.authorDatetime
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Cumulative Medication Duration Greater T:
define "Cumulative Medication Duration Greater Than or Equal to 84 Days":
	"CumulativeMedicationDuration"( "Medication Taken within 114 Days After Initial Dispense" ) >= 84
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Denominator Exclusions:
define "Denominator Exclusions":
	DenomExcl."Hospice Exclusions"
		or exists ["Medication, Active": "Antidepressant Medication" ] AntiDepMed
			with "Medication Dispensed 270 days before or 90 days after Start of Measurement Period" MedDisp
				such that AntiDepMed.relevantPeriod starts 105 days or less before MedDisp.authorDatetime
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Encounters:
define "Encounters":
	["Encounter, Performed": "Office Visit" ]
		union ["Encounter, Performed": "Face-to-Face Interaction" ]
		union ["Encounter, Performed": "Preventive Care Services - Established Office Visit, 18 and Up" ]
		union ["Encounter, Performed": "Preventive Care Services-Initial Office Visit, 18 and Up" ]
		union ["Encounter, Performed": "Home Healthcare Services" ]
		union ["Encounter, Performed": "Annual Wellness Visit" ]
		union ["Encounter, Performed": "Psych Visit - Diagnostic Evaluation" ]
		union ["Encounter, Performed": "Psych Visit - Psychotherapy" ]
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Initial Major Depression Diagnosis:
define "Initial Major Depression Diagnosis":
	First( ["Diagnosis": "Major Depression" ] Dx
			with "Medication Dispensed 270 days before or 90 days after Start of Measurement Period" Med
				such that Dx.prevalencePeriod starts 60 days or less before Med.authorDatetime
					or Dx.prevalencePeriod starts 60 days or less after Med.authorDatetime
			sort by start of prevalencePeriod
	) is not null
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Initial Population:
define "Initial Population":
	AgeInYearsAt( start of "Measurement Period" ) >= 18
		and "Initial Major Depression Diagnosis"
		and exists "Encounters"
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Numerator One:
define "Numerator One":
	"Cumulative Medication Duration Greater Than or Equal to 84 Days"
AntidepressantMedicationManagement.Numerator Two:
define "Numerator Two":
	"Cumulative Medication Duration Greater Than or Equal to 180 Days"
